CHAT.comment: ANTHONY PALAZZOLO, Petitioner v. RHODE ISLAND, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 1:00 p.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JAMES S. BURLING ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SHELDON WHITEHOUSE ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MALCOLM L. STEWART AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JAMES S. BURLING ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 2:10 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted. [*59] )
